task.title: Manage Key Pairs
task.shortdesc: This screen allows you to view a list of your key pairs, create new key pairs, and delete key pairs. You can page through the list of key pairs by clicking the navigation buttons at the bottom of the screen.

step.cmd: You can toggle between the table view and the grid view by clicking the appropriate icon next to the View label at the top right of the screen.
Sort the key pairs list by selecting a sort order using the Sort by drop-down list box.

task.title: Searching and Filtering the Key Pairs List

step.cmd: To perform a simple search/filter, type some search text into the search text box at the top right of the page.
Click the Create New Key Pair button. The Create new key pair page will appear.
Click the Import Public Key button. The Import key pair page will appear.

task.title: Actions
task.shortdesc: Each entry in the key pairs list has a context menu, accessible in the Actions column. Clicking the action icon brings up a menu of actions that you can perform on the selected image.
